prompts: Create a whimsical grass-type Pokemon that loves to dance and spread joy in flower-filled meadows.
I want a vibrant Pokemon with bright red flowers and a charming green body that radiates happiness.
Generate a small, playful Pokemon that thrives in sunny environments, surrounded by colorful blooms.
Make a flower-themed Pokemon that can harness the power of nature to heal its allies.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of spring, with a lush green body and cheerful demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that has a unique blend of floral and fairy characteristics, perfect for enchanting gardens.
Give me a Pokemon that is known for its gentle personality and ability to attract other creatures with its beauty.

distinctive_features: Bright red flower petals on its head
Large green leaves resembling a skirt
